[GAME] I see the turn brought a 10♣, giving me top pair (8♦8♥K♣) with a decent kicker. The board remains fairly draw-light—no flush possible yet and only J-9 makes a straight. My opponent just called the flop bet rather than raise.

I’m ahead of most one-pair holdings and draws, and I can afford a value bet that both extracts value from weaker 8, 7-x, or sky-high overcards and protects against any possible J-9 or 6-9 draws.

[Bet 100]
